price: 20. Waxaana dhab ahaan ku rumoobay Ibliis malihiisii13, wayna raaceen14, koox ka mid ah mu'miniinta mooyee.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَدَّقَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِبۡلِيسُ ظَنَّهُۥ فَٱتَّبَعُوهُ إِلَّا فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes:
13. Waa dadkii Saba ama dadka oo idil. 
14. Inay dadku u nugul yihiin dhumintiisa oo diyaar u yihiin.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣaddaqa ʿalayhim ib'līsu ẓannahu fa-ittabaʿūhu illā farīqan mina al-mu'minīna
